# NSTabView.TabType.topTabsBezelBorder

**Case**

The view includes tabs on the top of the view and has a bezeled border (the default).

## Declaration

```swift
case topTabsBezelBorder
```

## Constants

- **NSTabView.TabType.noTabsBezelBorder**: The view does not include tabs and has a bezeled border.
- **NSTabView.TabType.noTabsLineBorder**: The view does not include tabs and has a lined border.
- **NSTabView.TabType.noTabsNoBorder**: The view does not include tabs and has no border.
- **NSTabView.TabType.bottomTabsBezelBorder**: Tabs are on the bottom of the view with a bezeled border.
- **NSTabView.TabType.leftTabsBezelBorder**: Tabs are on the left of the view with a bezeled border.
- **NSTabView.TabType.rightTabsBezelBorder**: Tabs are on the right of the view with a bezeled border.
